scripts.db:reset: sequelize db:drop && sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.db:remigrate: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.db:setup: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize db:migrate && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize db:seed:all
